welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Fairfax Station, known for its beautiful greenery and historic charm. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Washington Dulles International Airport serves domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Washington Dulles International Airport serves primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Washington Dulles International Airport serves a mix of domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Potomac Airfield Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Montgomery County Airport serves all commercial flights and houses various amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Montgomery County Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
